document_data.name: Rot troll
document_data.mainbody: '''Rot trolls''' were a type of [[troll]] imbued with [[necrotic energy]].
document_data.Description: A rot troll's flesh peeled off from the skin as soon as it formed, and the troll's body withered constantly.
document_data.Abilities: Unlike a normal troll, a rot troll eventually lost its ability to regenerate, but it still healed properly. The monster was pulsing with necrotic energy, which was emitted from its withering shape.
document_data.Combat: Due to a rot troll's rancid degeneration, standing too close to it exposed other creatures to its deadly emanations. Only [[acid]] or fire could stop this necrotic radiation.
document_data.Creation: During regeneration, a normal troll could become infected with waves of necrotic energy and form a symbiotic connection with that deathly force.
document_data.Habitats: Rot trolls could be found in the [[Mere of Dead Men]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
